abstract: Restoration Hardware plans to raise as much as $300 million in an initial public offering that would allow its private equity backers to cash in on part of their investment in the U.S. furniture retailer, Reuters reported.
snippet: Restoration Hardware plans to raise as much as $300 million in an initial public offering that would allow its private equity backers to cash in on part of their investment in the U.S. furniture retailer, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Restoration Hardware plans to raise as much as $300 million in an initial public offering that would allow its private equity backers to cash in on part of their investment in the American furniture retailer, Reuters reported, citing a person familiar with the situation.

headline.main: Restoration Hardware Said to Consider an I.P.O.
